heroes.name: npc_dota_hero_largo
heroes.bio_loc: The exiled Murkroots of Veluâ€™Mar discovered a living island so ancient it speaks only in song. Raised among the shamanic bards who learned to commune with it, Largo now roams the realms with a troupe of frogling disciples, looking for inspiration for new melodies to bring back and share with his island home.
heroes.hype_loc: With his slick-strumming fingers and sticky-whip tongue, Largo is always ready to grant his team damage, healing, or speed and dispel friends or foes using just the right lick.
heroes.npe_desc_loc: Strums music to empower allies and can dispel with a lick

facets.description_loc: This facet doesn't do anything. Largo just arrived from the island of Velu'Mar...
facets.name: largo_largo

abilities.name: largo_catchy_lick
abilities.desc_loc:
Largo licks the targeted unit with his tongue, pulling it back a short distance, applying a basic dispel, and dealing damage if it's an enemy.

Dispelling an effect from a target grants Largo temporary health regeneration.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
abilities.lore_loc: After generations spent living on the ancient isaloth Velu'Mar, the descendants of the Murkroot exiles have grown resilient, happily sampling toxins that would've struck their ancestors dead.

abilities.name: largo_frogstomp
abilities.desc_loc: Largo tosses froglings to an area. They stomp the ground every %stomp_interval% second, dealing damage and ministuns, and enemies in the area have reduced movement speed.
abilities.lore_loc: Most Bard Monks spend decades mastering the musical arts, but even the top frog Largo has to admit that his young disciples have already grown shockingly good at counting a proper beat.

abilities.name: largo_croak_of_genius
abilities.desc_loc: Largo strums a tune to a friendly hero. The hero's items and abilities have reduced mana cost and a percentage of their damage reverberates over the following %damage_duration% seconds. When an affected hero spends mana, the remaining buff duration is reduced by %duration_reduction%s.
abilities.lore_loc: Largo loves to help his friends find glory through the power of music, never missing a chance at a killer duet.
notes_loc: Only applies to damage sources affected by spell amplification.

abilities.name: largo_encore
abilities.desc_loc: Buffs that Largo applies to himself or his team have extended duration.
abilities.shard_loc:
Whenever Largo applies a Unit Target buff to a friendly hero, he also gets the buff.

If Largo targets himself, the buff is also applied to the nearest allied hero within the cast range of the targeted ability.

abilities.name: largo_amphibian_rhapsody
abilities.desc_loc:
Largo gets ready to groove. He is disarmed and his ability bar switches to 3 song abilities, each with different effects. Songs are only effective if strummed on the beat.

Every time he strums successfully, he gains a stack of Groovin'. Each stack gives him bonus armor and reduces the mana cost of every song, but he loses a stack if he misses a beat. Stacks linger for a short duration when Largo's song ends.
abilities.lore_loc: The very first Bard Monk played a song that summoned a living island and saved the Murkroot exiles from a salt-worn death.
notes_loc: Items can be used while in this mode.
abilities.scepter_loc: Largo can play two songs per beat by strumming both at the same time. On beats when he strums two songs, Largo deals %burst_damage% + %damage_per_stack% magic damage per Groovin' stack to nearby enemies.

special_values.name: song_cost_reduction_per_stack_tooltip
special_values.heading_loc: SONG MANA COST REDUCTION PER STACK:

abilities.name: largo_song_fight_song
abilities.desc_loc: Largo plays a song that increases nearby allied heroes' spell amplification and grants their attacks additional magic damage.
abilities.lore_loc: 'Hey, when a beach brawl breaks out, you gotta learn to throw your musical weight around or the party's over proper quick.'

abilities.name: largo_song_double_time
abilities.desc_loc: Largo plays a song that increases nearby friendly units' movement speed and grants a brief slow resistance.
abilities.lore_loc: 'It's like that old story about the scary swamp witch. You better watch just where you're jumping when you're trying to do it lickety-split.'

abilities.name: largo_song_good_vibrations
abilities.desc_loc: Largo plays a song that heals nearby friendly heroes.
abilities.lore_loc: 'If this song can heal an ageless isaloth, it can handle a few cuts and bruises on the lot of you.'

talents.name: special_bonus_unique_largo_3
talents.name_loc: {s:bonus_damage_hp_pct}% Croak of Genius Max Health DPS

talents.name: special_bonus_unique_largo_4
talents.name_loc: +{s:bonus_AbilityCastRange} Catchy Lick Cast Range / +{s:bonus_pull_distance} Pull Distance
